alert.note: Alert for Jefferson (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 06 at 3:51PM EDT until July 06 at 4:15PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 PM EDT FOR CENTRAL JEFFERSON COUNTY... At 351 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Fairdale, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Audubon Park, Fairdale and Newburg around 355 PM EDT. Watterson Park, Lynnview, Hollyvilla, Poplar Hills, South Park View and Okolona around 400 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include West Buechel, Hollow Creek, Spring Mill, Highview, Fern Creek and Minor Lane Heights. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
